Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 8.2.5

==Policy Statement==

Forbid recycled passwords.

==Policy Purpose==

Not allowing old passwords to be recycled ensures that the old passwords cannot be used if they have been compromised.

==Related Guidance==

* [[a3f48e53-b118-4180-8aa1-e945f1afadda|Force Password Renewal]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[af1a2a69-bb4d-4ca4-86ab-174c4c5e3ca9|Password Renewal Is Enforced]]
